label: Use last modified timestamp for episodes?
Use created timestamp for episodes (can only be enabled if 'Use last modified timestamp' is NOT enabled)?

Comma separated list of values to scrub from the episode title (default value: .= ,-= ,_= ). The format of the setting is A=B,C=D where A will be replaced by B and C will be replaced by D. This setting is only applicable when Enable episode title scrubbing? is enabled.
File extension to use for summary files (default value: summary). Do not include the period ('.') in the value.
File extension to use for metadata files (default value: metadata). Do not include the period ('.') in the value.
Use time stamp from the file name in the episode title (default value: false). Only valid for files following date/time naming format.
Episode title time stamp format (default value: 24 Hour). Only valid if 'Use time stamp from the file name in the episode title' is selected.
